医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Bio-Techne 的高级细胞诊断 (ACD) 通过无蛋白酶 RNAscope 多组学树立了空间生物学新标准Bio-Techne Corporation（纳斯达克股票代码：TECH）今天宣布，Bio-Techne 空间生物学品牌 Advanced Cell Diagnostics (ACD) 已通过开发下一代无蛋白酶 RNAscope 空间多组学工作流程树立了新标准。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Bio-Technee28099s-Advanced-Cell-Diagnostics-(ACD)-sets-new-standard-in-spatial-biology-with-protease-free-RNAscope-多组学.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Bio-Technee28099s-Advanced-Cell-Diagnostics-(ACD)-sets-new-standard-in-spatial-biology-with-protease-free-RNAscope- multiomics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1fb3ffa8-26ed-423f-b37c-78c0dc96b55b Tue, 30 Jan 2024 02:23:00 -0500 Bio-Techne’s Advanced Cell Diagnostics (ACD) sets new standard in spatial biology with protease-free RNAscope multiomics
研究发现肉桂补充剂可降低糖尿病前期患者的血糖一项为期 12 周的研究表明，每日补充肉桂可显着降低肥胖和超重糖尿病前期个体的血糖水平，这表明肠道微生物群的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Cinnamon-supplements-found-to-reduce-blood-glucose-in-prediabetics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Cinnamon-supplements-found-to-reduce-blood-glucose-in-prediabetics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c356a4c1-c207-4256-84fe-e05610fa0805 Mon, 29 Jan 2024 23:54:00 -0500 Cinnamon supplements found to reduce blood glucose in prediabetics
三文鱼的秘密酱汁：营养代谢组学揭示地中海主食中有益心脏健康的化合物研究人员利用营养代谢组学揭示了地中海饮食的关键组成部分鲑鱼含有有益于心脏代谢健康的独特化合物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Salmons-secret-sauce-Nutrimetabolomics-uncovers-heart-healthy-compounds-in-Mediterranean-staple.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Salmons-secret-sauce-Nutrimetabolomics-uncovers-heart-healthy-compounds-in-Mediterranean-staple.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3157bc​​1a-3464-492b-bbf1-1cf59b8b52ab Mon, 29 Jan 2024 23:29:00 -0500 Salmon's secret sauce: Nutrimetabolomics uncovers heart-healthy compounds in Mediterranean staple
低 FODMAP 饮食在 IBS 管理中显示出前景，研究发现微妙的好处和挑战研究人员回顾了低 FODMAP 饮食在治疗 IBS 方面的机制，强调了其在缓解症状的饮食实施中的功效和挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Low-FODMAP-diet-shows-promise-in-IBS-management-study-finds-nuanced-benefits-and-challenges.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Low-FODMAP-diet-shows-promise-in-IBS-management-study-finds-nuanced-benefits-and-challenges.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7e04b016-2a24-4592-bf57-aa8dd964302a Mon, 29 Jan 2024 23:06:00 -0500 Low FODMAP diet shows promise in IBS management, study finds nuanced benefits and challenges
美国心脏协会为心脏骤停生存制定了雄心勃勃的目标只有 10% 的心脏骤停患者能够幸存。在美国心脏协会紧急心血管护理 2030 年影响目标和改善心脏骤停结果的行动呼吁中概述的新挑战目标中，美国心脏协会的志愿者咨询紧急心血管护理委员会提出了将生存率提高一倍至 20% 的理由。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/American-Heart-Association-sets-ambitious-targets-for-cardiac-arrest-survival.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/American-Heart-Association-sets-ambitious-targets-for-cardiac-arrest-survival.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ded4b217-de06-4366-9ed5-b7423796ad36 Mon, 29 Jan 2024 23:02:18 -0500 American Heart Association sets ambitious targets for cardiac arrest survival
肿瘤胎儿生态系统与肝癌复发和免疫治疗反应相关来自新加坡国家癌症中心 (NCCS)、新加坡科学技术研究局 (A*STAR)、哈利·珀金斯医学研究所和全球研究合作伙伴的临床医生科学家和研究人员团队发现，癌症之间存在因果关系。原发性肝癌肝细胞癌（HCC）中存在癌胎儿生态系统（由肿瘤驱动的胎儿程序/特征的重新出现）以及癌症复发和对免疫治疗的反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Oncofetal-ecosystems-linked-to-recurrence-and-immunotherapy-response-in-liver-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Oncofetal-ecosystems-linked-to-recurrence-and-immunotherapy-response-in-liver-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ef83fb0c-3e96-47fd-ac75-b9016245f808 Mon, 29 Jan 2024 22:55:01 -0500 Oncofetal ecosystems linked to recurrence and immunotherapy response in liver cancer
发酵食品通过肠脑连接对心理健康有益研究人员探索了发酵食品对微生物群-肠-脑轴的心理健康益处，强调需要进一步研究以了解其治疗潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Fermented-foods-linked-to-mental-health-benefits-through-gut-brain-connection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Fermented-foods-linked-to-mental-health-benefits-through-gut-brain-connection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ede66379-5b17-4d90-9080-1400a03af02d Mon, 29 Jan 2024 22:47:00 -0500 Fermented foods linked to mental health benefits through gut-brain connection
从损失中学习：美国 covid-19 经验为未来公共卫生指明了道路在 2024 年美国总统大选之前，英国医学杂志 (BMJ) 今天推出了一个前瞻性系列文章，重点介绍了可以从美国的 covid-19 经历中汲取的教训，以及为防止下一次大流行中又失去 100 万公民所需采取的行动改善和保护人口健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Learning-from-loss-US-covid-19-experience-charts-path-for-future-public-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Learning-from-loss-US-covid-19-experience-charts-path-for-future-public-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75d37163-3a24-4605-be36-91e874c4546f Mon, 29 Jan 2024 22:43:40 -0500 Learning from loss: US covid-19 experience charts path for future public health
产前空气污染暴露会增加新生儿严重呼吸窘迫的风险宾夕法尼亚州立大学医学院与加拿大卫生部领导的母婴环境化学物质研究 (MIREC) 合作进行的新研究表明，产前接触空气污染会增加新生儿严重呼吸窘迫的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Prenatal-air-pollution-exposure-increases-the-risk-of-severe-respiratory-distress-in-newborns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Prenatal-air-pollution-exposure-increases-the-risk-of-severe-respiratory-distress-in-newborns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3f88359-2321-4aab-bbf0-d1ea280b3051 Mon, 29 Jan 2024 22:04:37 -0500 Prenatal air pollution exposure increases the risk of severe respiratory distress in newborns
机器学习开启了早期卵巢癌检测的个性化方法三十多年来，医生一直未能对卵巢癌进行高度准确的早期诊断测试。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Machine-learning-unlocks-personalized-approach-to-early-ovarian-cancer-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Machine-learning-unlocks-personalized-approach-to-early-ovarian-cancer-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=abd93df2-16dd-438b-a620-07a89e019f9b Mon, 29 Jan 2024 21:59:14 -0500 Machine learning unlocks personalized approach to early ovarian cancer detection
